title: ONLINE or IN-Person - June Online User Group: 3 Lightning Talks (Brisbane)
thumbnailDescription: ONLINE or IN-Person - June Online User Group: 3 Lightning Talks (Brisbane)
presenterName: Jernej "JK" Kavka, William Liebenberg, and Bryden Oliver
eventShortDescription:
​Join us live at SSW Brisbane – There will be news, chats, pizza and a Live Stream for those who can't be there in person:


SSW TV -----> www.ssw.com.au/live/

REGISTER​

For those joining us in person:

6pm - Check-in, Pizza, & networking
6:30pm - Live feed kicks off with the news
7pm - Lightning Talks!

-----

#1 Getting the most out of your logging in .NET
with Jernej "JK" Kavka

Does setting up logging do your head in? Join JK, a battle scared logging in .NET Core veteran as he attempts to reduce your headache. Dissolve an aspirin, dim the lights, and let JK soothe your head. In this talk, you will learn easily from JK's past trials and errors and get straight into setting up logs like a Pro!

#2 Taking control of your APIs with Azure API Management
with William Liebenberg

In this lightning talk William covers his favourite features of Azure API Management such as the Developer Portal, Policies and Analytics and how easy it is for you to start using them to secure and monitor your own APIs. He will also highlight where Azure API Management becomes really difficult to manage and how to tackle those issues.

#3 An intro to Biceps of Steel
with Bryden Oliver

In this talk Bryden will cover how to create Bicep templates, how to add Managed Identities. He will then walk you through his new GitHub Repo, "Biceps of Steel", with the relevant code and examples.
